title: Looking for 2 players to join a fun and casual ranked 5's team
body:
Looking for 2 players to join our ranked 5's team, things like role and rank dont really matter as we are more looking to be casual and fun, general rules are to not be toxic and being social is preferred.
to join please add me in game and we will go from there
IGN: EndlesschocXD

replies.body: what do you mean by "alternate playstyles"?
Feel free to add me on hashshashin im more then willing to join
